# So Far From Home

[![Global Game Jam](https://img.shields.io/badge/Global%20Game%20Jam-2019-181717.svg?logo=data:image/png;base64,)](https://globalgamejam.org/2019/games/so-far-home)\
 [![GitHub Pages](https://img.shields.io/badge/GitHub%20Pages-181717.svg?logo=github)](http://entropedia.co.uk/GGJ2019/)\
 [![Unity Version: 2019.3.0f6](https://img.shields.io/badge/Unity-2018.3.3f1-333333.svg?logo=unity)](https://unity3d.com/get-unity/download/archive)

Searching between the sofa cushions for a missing key, but what else is down there? Every item to you find tells a little piece of the story of your life and friendships.

[![Snoot Cover](./img/title.JPG)](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QG4aYGcsoio)

**Global Game Jam 2019**\
**Theme**: "Home"

## Credits

**[Anthony Marmont](https://github.com/Fydar):** Code and UI\
